sentences.cn: 黑猩猩是熟练的攀援者.

sentences.en: He is adept at getting himself out of difficult situations.
sentences.cn: 他善于使自己摆脱困境.

sentences.en: He is adept at organization work.
He is unusually adept in mathematical calculations.
He was highly adept at avoiding trouble.
He's usually very adept at keeping his private life out of the media.
sentences.cn: 他通常很善于使自己的私生活避开媒体的关注。

sentences.en: I’m afraid she’s also an adept liar.
sentences.cn: 恐怕她还是一个撒谎专家。

sentences.en: Kitzi was an adept at getting people to talk confidentially to him.
sentences.cn: 基齐很善于引导别人与其谈心。
做针线活儿,她可是把好手.

sentences.en: She was also surprisingly adept at speaking without moving her lips.
sentences.cn: 她那技术娴熟得叫人惊异不叠,讲话时嘴唇也不动.

sentences.en: The author is adept in depicting vast scenes.
sentences.cn: 作者很善于描写大的场面.

sentences.en: The direct marketing industry has become adept at packaging special offers.
sentences.cn: 直接邮寄广告业在特卖品的包装方面已经变得非常熟练了。

sentences.en: When it comes to photography, I'm not an adept.
sentences.cn: 要说照相, 我不是内行.
